name: data-card-08
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Block Smash.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Block Smash.

flavor_text.black-white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Block Smash.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won Block Smash.
